divs: Sighting DetailsSaw a small dot in the sky about 45 degrees south west in the sky for about about a minute. It was very bright in the begining but began fading slowly until it was gone. The size of the light projection in front of it was what made it so anomolous, it was maybe 15 times the size of a full moon. It looked like it was going north.
Summary: Light in sky with very large triangular light projection in front of it
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Arlington
There were no other sightings in Arlington on or around September 19th 2009
